about_the_game:
Welcome to Intown, a city shrouded in nightmares

Intown is a city built around a science station where nightmares become reality. Follow how the impact of nightmares on Intown changes over time in seven unique stories, each taking place at a different time and place in the city, starting in the 70s and ending in 2025.

Explore a city filled with terror

Intown Nightmares features dark streets, creepy houses, and a gloomy forest. Explore the city to uncover its secrets and find a way out of the nightmare.



Solve puzzles and fight monsters

To survive in Intown, you'll have to solve puzzles and fight monsters in some stories. Use your weapons and wit to defeat enemies and find a way out of the nightmare.



Enjoy great graphics and music

Intown is a visually stunning game with pixelated graphics, cool lighting and elaborate textures. The soundtrack in the game is beautiful and dark, creating an unforgettable atmosphere.



Solve the mystery of nightmares

What caused the nightmares in Intown? What is their purpose? Uncover the mystery of the nightmares and find a way to stop them before they destroy the town.

Intown Nightmares is a horror almanac that will leave you with an unforgettable experience. Follow seven unique stories, explore a city full of horror, meet unforgettable characters, solve puzzles and in some stories fight monsters. Uncover the mystery of nightmares and save Intown.

Game Features:

Seven unique stories taking place at different times and places in the city.
Exploration of the city filled with horror.
Puzzles and battles with monsters.
Great graphics and music.
Solving the mystery of nightmares and saving the city.
